abstract: Sri Lankan Prime Min Ranil Wickremesinghe says he is working on repairing civil war troubles, including releasing hundreds of political prisoners and giving back land seized mainly from minority Tamils.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe said he has only just begun to grapple with the profound issues of releasing political prisoners and handing back land seized mostly from minority Tamils.

headline.main: Sri Lanka Premier Starts With Fixing Civil War Ills
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka Premier Starts With Fixing Civil War Ills

snippet: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe said he has only just begun to grapple with the profound issues of releasing political prisoners and handing back land seized mostly from minority Tamils.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
